item.title: >_ whoami
item.description:
Traditional pivoting (like SSH dynamic forwarding) often feels like driving with the parking brake onâ€”youâ€™re limited byÂ proxychainsÂ and slow TCP overhead.Â Ligolo-ngÂ changes the game by creating aÂ TUN interface, effectively placing your attack machine directly inside the victim’s internal network.

Architecture overview

ligolo-ng works on a Client/Server model.

Proxy

Runs on yourÂ AttackerÂ machine (Kali). It manages the tunnel and routing.

Agent (The Client):

Runs on theÂ Compromised HostÂ (the “Pivot”). It calls back to your proxy.
